issues.title: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds
issues.description: Ensure the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds

relatedNodes.html: How to Upload Videos to YouTube if Access to Website is Blocked

any.message: Element has insufficient color contrast of 2.8 (foreground color: #ffffff, background color: #4aad6a, font size: 22.5pt (30px), font weight: bold). Expected contrast ratio of 3:1

nodes.html: How to Upload Videos to YouTube if Access to Website is Blocked
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 2.8 (foreground color: #ffffff, background color: #4aad6a, font size: 22.5pt (30px), font weight: bold). Expected contrast ratio of 3:1

issues.title: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 3:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 2.81:1. Recommendation:  change background to #44a764.

original_issue.message: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 3:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 2.81:1. Recommendation:  change background to #44a764.

issues.title: Background and foreground colors do not have a sufficient contrast ratio.
issues.description: Low-contrast text is difficult or impossible for many users to read. [Learn how to provide sufficient color contrast](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/color-contrast).

issues.title: Aside should not be contained in another landmark
issues.description: Ensure the complementary landmark or aside is at top level

any.message: The null landmark is contained in another landmark.

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  The null landmark is contained in another landmark.

issues.title: Links must be distinguishable without relying on color
issues.description: Ensure links are distinguished from surrounding text in a way that does not rely on color

relatedNodes.html: ichard, who works for a large Fortune 100 company, recently wrote on Facebook that he cannot upload screencast video clips to YouTube since the company he works for has blocked access to YouTube and other video sharing websites through the firewall.

any.message: The link has insufficient color contrast of 2.06:1 with the surrounding text. (Minimum contrast is 3:1, link text: #006f5d, surrounding text: #333333)

relatedNodes.html: ichard, who works for a large Fortune 100 company, recently wrote on Facebook that he cannot upload screencast video clips to YouTube since the company he works for has blocked access to YouTube and other video sharing websites through the firewall.

any.message: The link has no styling (such as underline) to distinguish it from the surrounding text

nodes.html: who works for a large Fortune 100 company, recently wrote on Facebook
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  The link has insufficient color contrast of 2.06:1 with the surrounding text. (Minimum contrast is 3:1, link text: #006f5d, surrounding text: #333333)
  The link has no styling (such as underline) to distinguish it from the surrounding text

issues.title: Links must be distinguishable without relying on color
issues.description: Ensure links are distinguished from surrounding text in a way that does not rely on color

relatedNodes.html: One of the available options is to use your mobile phone for uploading videos on YouTube — just create a mobile profile on YouTube from a computer outside the organization's firewall and then email the video to YouTube as an MMS message.

relatedNodes.html: The second more versatile option is the one-to-many Hey!Spread — this is an online service to help you upload a video clip to multiple video sharing websites in one go.

issues.title: Links rely on color to be distinguishable.
issues.description: Low-contrast text is difficult or impossible for many users to read. Link text that is discernible improves the experience for users with low vision. [Learn how to make links distinguishable](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/link-in-text-block).
